name: cursor-live-ticker
description: A kiosk-friendly live ticker dashboard for Cursor team usage (tokens, spend, activity) using Cursor Admin API.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c auto "npm run dev --workspace server" "npm run dev --workspace client"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace client && npm run build --workspace server
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace server && npm run typecheck --workspace client
